document.discussion_title: BACKGROUND Sunday's gold medallists at the Rio Olympics
document.topic_text: BACKGROUND Sunday's gold medallists at the Rio Olympics Europe, Europa By our dpa-correspondent and Rio de Janeiro (dpa) - Gold medallists from Sunday‘s 12 finals at the Rio de Janeiro Olympics, the last of the Games.Athletics men‘s marathon - Eliud Kipchoge, Kenya Basketball men‘s final - US Boxing women‘s middleweight - Claressa Shields, US Boxing men‘s flyweight - Shakhobidin Zoirov, Uzbekistan Boxing men‘s light welterweight - Fazliddin Gaibnazarov, Uzbekistan Boxing men‘s super heavyweight - Tony Yoka, France Gymnastics rhythmic group all-around - Russia Handball men‘s final - Denmark Mountain biking men‘s cross country - Nino Schurter, Switzerland Volleyball men‘s final - Brazil Wrestling men‘s 65kg - Soslan Ramonov, Russia Wrestling men‘s 97kg - Kyle Snyder, US
document.post: BACKGROUND Sunday's gold medallists at the Rio Olympics Europe, Europa By our dpa-correspondent and Rio de Janeiro (dpa) - Gold medallists from Sunday‘s 12 finals at the Rio de Janeiro Olympics, the last of the Games.Athletics men‘s marathon - Eliud Kipchoge, Kenya Basketball men‘s final - US Boxing women‘s middleweight - Claressa Shields, US Boxing men‘s flyweight - Shakhobidin Zoirov, Uzbekistan Boxing men‘s light welterweight - Fazliddin Gaibnazarov, Uzbekistan Boxing men‘s super heavyweight - Tony Yoka, France Gymnastics rhythmic group all-around - Russia Handball men‘s final - Denmark Mountain biking men‘s cross country - Nino Schurter, Switzerland Volleyball men‘s final - Brazil Wrestling men‘s 65kg - Soslan Ramonov, Russia Wrestling men‘s 97kg - Kyle Snyder, US
